thread.title: Democrat Maxine Waters Claims She’s More Patriotic Than Trump Supporters
thread.title_full: Democrat Maxine Waters Claims She’s More Patriotic Than Trump Supporters

author: V Saxena
title: Democrat Maxine Waters Claims She’s More Patriotic Than Trump Supporters
text:
Libs at NYT Admit Trump Didn’t Win by “Whitelash”… Instead Convinced Obama Voters To Turn 
Listen to her full rant below, if you can stand it: 
While trying to compare the patriotism of all black voters with that of Trump supporters would just be silly, if not also racist, it was certainly possible to draw a contrast between what Rep. Waters believes and the Trump voters she clearly viewed as her real enemy.   
For starters, did you know that she had a soft spot in her heart for late Cuban dictator and mass murderer Fidel Castro? “Viva Fidel!” she proudly chanted in 2000 after the dictator spoke at a church in Harlem, according to Townhall . 
Most Trump voters don’t support the Cuban dictatorship. 
It appears Waters also has an affinity for cop killers. After she voted in favor of a resolution calling for the extradition of the cop killer known Assata Shakur from Cuba in 1998, she wrote an apology letter to Castro claiming essentially that she had not realized Shakur — whose real name was Joanne Chesimard — was a beloved cop kiler. 
“I, and some of the Members of the Congressional Black Caucus, mistakenly voted for House Concurrent Resolution 254 which called on the Government of Cuba to extradite to the United States Joanne Chesimard and all other individuals who have fled the United States from political persecution and received political asylum in Cuba,” she wrote.
